text: Curt James Haydn (February 12, 1919 - March 31, 1999) was a Norwegian bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, he finished 12th in the four-man and 14th in the two-man events. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh two-man results *1952 bobsleigh four-man results *James Haydn's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1919 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Bobsledders at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian male bobsledders
title: Curt James Haydn
